node.name: Mylyn Trac Connector
node.shortdescription:
Trac is an enhanced wiki and issue tracking system for software development projects. Trac uses a minimalistic approach to web-based software project management.

The Mylyn Trac Connector provides Eclipse integration for accessing Trac issues including offline editing and access to attachments. Connection to the repository is supported through Trac's XML-RPC Plugin (recommended) or through the web-interface (limited).

Supported Trac versions: 0.11, 0.12.
node.body:
Trac is an enhanced wiki and issue tracking system for software development projects. Trac uses a minimalistic approach to web-based software project management.

The Mylyn Trac Connector provides Eclipse integration for accessing Trac issues including offline editing and access to attachments. Connection to the repository is supported through Trac's XML-RPC Plugin (recommended) or through the web-interface (limited).

Supported Trac versions: 0.11, 0.12.
